item.title: Clear Home Assistant Refresh Tokens
item.description: As much as I love Home assistant there are some small papercuts that can make it annoying to deal with, this is one of them. Every time you elect to “stay signed in” and you don’t sign out before exiting the page you’ll have a nice token sitting in this long list of your previous mistakes. I found this quick fix on Reddit, but understand that this will clear ALL the tokens in your home assistant (even the session that youre currently in) so you’ll have to log back in.
